DOC.brief_summary: A major challenge of peritoneal dialysis (PD) therapy is the development of glucose-sparing strategies able to provide an efficacious ultrafiltration (UF) profile. Study hypothesis is to evaluate the possibility to formulate PD solutions containing L-carnitine as an osmotic agent to partially replace glucose.
DOC.brief_title: L-Carnitine as an Osmo-metabolic Agent for Peritoneal Dialysis
